isis.stitle: 13 SPEED TRANSMISSIONS EATON RTLO-14613 - INSTALL - MAINSHAFT ASSEMBLY

step1.para: Block the right countershaft assembly against the case wall and lower the mainshaft assembly into position with the reverse gear held against LO speed gear and rear of the shaft moved into the case bore ( Figure 248).

figure.caption: Figure 248. Lower Mainshaft Assembly into Position

step1.para: Move the pilot end of the mainshaft into the pocket bushing of the input shaft ( Figure 249).

figure.caption: Figure 249. Move Pilot End of Mainshaft into Pocket Bushing

step1.para: With the reverse gear remaining against the LO speed gear, mesh the corresponding forward speed gears of the left countershaft assembly ( Figure 250). Check to make sure that the marked tooth on the left countershaft drive gear has remained in mesh with the marked set of teeth on the main drive gear.

figure.caption: Figure 250. Mesh Corresponding Forward Speed Gears of Left Countershaft Assembly

step1.para: Center the rear of the mainshaft in the case bore and install the auxiliary drive gear assembly on the shaft, partially seating the bearing bore ( Figure 251). DO NOT COMPLETE INSTALLATION AT THIS TIME.

figure.caption: Figure 251. Install Auxiliary Drive Gear Assembly on Shaft
